See @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.EUNZ2PDKp7Amu7CX]{Magic} for full details on divine magic.

Spell casting: From 8th level, due to a deep connection with nature, a ranger gains the ability to cast spells. The power and number of spells available to a ranger are determined by the characterâ€™s experience level. The list of spells available to rangers is found in Druid and Illusionist Spells (rangers use the @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.EUNZ2PDKp7Amu7CX.JournalEntryPage.zvY8pHVp2p7969z9]{Druid Spell List}.
